Medford.House at 5 Willow Court:
The House at 5 Willow Court in Arlington, Massachusetts is a rare local example of Second Empire styling.


== Description and history ==
The house originally stood on Massachusetts Avenue (its construction date is not known), and was moved to its present site as that road developed more commercially in the 1930s. It has a mansard roof typical of the style, and its windows are topped by eared surrounds.
